original_question: Question: Classify the main theme of the following paragraph. Is it primarily about: a) The benefits of teamwork, b) The challenges of remote work, c) Effective communication strategies, d) Time management techniques? Explain your reasoning based on the text.\nReference Text: "Working from home offers flexibility, but it also requires strong discipline and clear boundaries between professional and personal life. Without the structure of an office, individuals must proactively manage their schedules to maintain productivity and avoid burnout."
